title: Supporting Tools for Tada Science
text: can install development version tada GitHub :

title: package roulette — pkg_roulette
code: pkg_roulette(   time = 4,   n = 100,   pkgs,   cols = sample(colors(), n, replace = TRUE) )

title: package roulette — pkg_roulette
text: time long seconds roulette runs. increasingly speed . n number packages roulette, packages selected utils::available.packages(). Ignored pkgs= given. pkgs Packages show roulette. cols colors. default pick n colors built-grDevices::colors().

title: package roulette — pkg_roulette
code: pkg_roulette(   time = 2,   pkgs = sample(c("dplyr", "ggplot2", "data.table", "Rcpp", "arrow", "duckdb")) ) #>   arrow           Rcpp         data.table                     dplyr           ggplot2               duckdb  if (FALSE) {  # roulette of 100 available CRAN packages  pkg_roulette(time = 4, n = 100) }
